channel.title: Twitter @Google AI
channel.description: Google AI is focused on bringing the benefits of AI to everyone. In conducting and applying our research, we advance the state-of-the-art in many domains. - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: We’re inspired by the incredible lightning talks and demos shared at Research@ Bangalore. A special shoutout to all of our speakers and attendees fro...
item.description: We’re inspired by the incredible lightning talks and demos shared at Research@ Bangalore. A special shoutout to all of our speakers and attendees from the researcher, developer, and academic communities and beyond. Together, we're shaping the future and driving meaningful change.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: TimesFM is a forecasting model, pre-trained on a large time-series corpus of 100 billion real world time-points, that displays impressive zero-shot pe...
item.description: TimesFM is a forecasting model, pre-trained on a large time-series corpus of 100 billion real world time-points, that displays impressive zero-shot performance on a variety of public benchmarks from different domains and granularities. Learn more → https://goo.gle/480VRlm
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today on the blog, learn how we developed simple and effective fixes to the dual challenges of spurious features and simplicity bias by applying early...
item.description: Today on the blog, learn how we developed simple and effective fixes to the dual challenges of spurious features and simplicity bias by applying early readouts and feature forgetting, resulting in substantially improved generalization to unseen domains. ↓ https://goo.gle/3Shf5gE
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Re Check out MobileDiffusion’s potential for rapid text-to-image on-device in testing, shown below:
item.description: Re Check out MobileDiffusion’s potential for rapid text-to-image on-device in testing, shown below:
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Introducing MobileDiffusion, a novel approach with the potential for rapid (sub-second) text-to-image generation on-device. An efficient latent diffus...
item.description: Introducing MobileDiffusion, a novel approach with the potential for rapid (sub-second) text-to-image generation on-device. An efficient latent diffusion model with a comparably small model size, it is well suited for mobile deployment. Learn more →https://goo.gle/3vWqE5J
item.author: Google AI

item.title: We’re excited to bring our first Research@ event of 2024 to Bangalore! This Thursday, Research@ Bangalore is bringing researchers at Google together ...
item.description:
We’re excited to bring our first Research@ event of 2024 to Bangalore! This Thursday, Research@ Bangalore is bringing researchers at Google together to share a series of lightning talks & demos showcasing their work.

Learn more about Research@ →https://goo.gle/3vQfU8S
item.author: Google AI

item.title: When we connect & share ideas, we create a collective brilliance that propels innovation forward. We launched our Research@ series to engage more clos...
item.description: When we connect & share ideas, we create a collective brilliance that propels innovation forward. We launched our Research@ series to engage more closely with the external research community & share our work. Take a peek into the excitement of Research@ →https://goo.gle/3vQfU8S
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Google Research is making exciting advances on understanding how our brains work & how we think. Learn about our efforts to map the brain’s neural co...
item.description: Google Research is making exciting advances on understanding how our brains work & how we think. Learn about our efforts to map the brain’s neural connections in this Research@ NYC lighting talk hosted by Viren Jain, Sr Staff Research Scientist at Google →https://goo.gle/3SbSClk
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Discover how Google Research is working to extend speech, translation, and language processing technologies to the 1,000 most spoken languages in the ...
item.description: Discover how Google Research is working to extend speech, translation, and language processing technologies to the 1,000 most spoken languages in the world in this lightning talk hosted by Uche Okonkwo and Sandy Ritchie at Research@ NYC → https://goo.gle/48Y0wWf
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Most of an LLM’s memory & compute are consumed by matrix multiplication operations. Today on the blog, learn about techniques used to accelerate mixe...
item.description: Most of an LLM’s memory & compute are consumed by matrix multiplication operations. Today on the blog, learn about techniques used to accelerate mixed-input matrix multiplication for increased efficiency w/ performance close to peak hardware capabilities ↓https://goo.gle/3tXPuS8
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Congratulations to Googlers Natasha Noy, @Jimantha, & former Googler Ramon Caceres for being named ACM (@TheOfficialACM) Fellows, in recognition of tr...
item.description: Congratulations to Googlers Natasha Noy, @Jimantha, & former Googler Ramon Caceres for being named ACM (@TheOfficialACM) Fellows, in recognition of transformative contributions to computing science & technology that have improved how we live, work & play.https://goo.gle/48K8Nxn
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Google Research works to progress science, advance society & improve the lives of billions of people. From Research@ NYC watch Corinna Cortes (VP, Res...
item.description: Google Research works to progress science, advance society & improve the lives of billions of people. From Research@ NYC watch Corinna Cortes (VP, Research) & Katherine Chou (Sr Director, Product Management) discuss what's top of mind for Google Research →https://goo.gle/492R9V1
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Graph transformers are important for ML on graph-structured data, but scaling them up for large graphs is difficult. Here you can learn about Exphorme...
item.description: Graph transformers are important for ML on graph-structured data, but scaling them up for large graphs is difficult. Here you can learn about Exphormer, a sparse attention framework that uses expander graphs to improve scalability for graph transformers. https://goo.gle/48JVvAW
item.author: Google AI

item.title: As the race to build the world's first truly useful quantum computer intensifies, so does the need for clear-eyed assessment. In this episode of Field...
item.description: As the race to build the world's first truly useful quantum computer intensifies, so does the need for clear-eyed assessment. In this episode of Field Notes, dive deeper w/ @GoogleQuantumAI to understand the reality of quantum computing & its impact. 📽️ →https://goo.gle/3HpQeSX
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Google Research helped develop Audio Magic Eraser, an AI-powered editing feature for Pixel 8 & Pixel 8 Pro that helps reduce distracting sounds in vid...
item.description: Google Research helped develop Audio Magic Eraser, an AI-powered editing feature for Pixel 8 & Pixel 8 Pro that helps reduce distracting sounds in videos via #ML models that can identify & sort sounds into distinct layers that you can control. Check it out:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8BoXYzjo7cA
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Introducing ASPIRE, a framework that enhances the selective prediction capabilities of large language models, enabling them to output an answer paired...
item.description: Introducing ASPIRE, a framework that enhances the selective prediction capabilities of large language models, enabling them to output an answer paired with a confidence score. Learn how it outperforms state-of-the-art methods on a variety of QA datasets. →…
item.author: Google AI

item.title: The Google Quantum AI team embraces the intersection between art & science, as seen in their quantum computing labs in Santa Barbara, CA. Check out @N...
item.description: The Google Quantum AI team embraces the intersection between art & science, as seen in their quantum computing labs in Santa Barbara, CA. Check out @NewsHour’s walk-through of this space, where art brings the lab to life and inspires innovation →https://goo.gle/47CNhZS
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Re AMIE is one way we are safely exploring a vision of the future, where AI systems might be better aligned with attributes of a skilled clinician. Fu...
item.description: Re AMIE is one way we are safely exploring a vision of the future, where AI systems might be better aligned with attributes of a skilled clinician. Further research is needed in this domain to ensure that we are building safe, equitable, helpful, and transparent #HealthAI systems.
item.author: Google AI
